def square_cake(n, h, v):

    # Find the dimensions of the largest piece of cake
    x = min(h, n - h, v, n - v)

    # Find the volume of the largest piece of cake
    return x * x * 4

print(square_cake(10, 4, 7))
print(square_cake(5, 2, 2))

def main():
    # Read input
    n, h, v = [int(x) for x in input().split()]

    # Compute largest volume
    volume = (n - max(h, n - h)) * (n - max(v, n - v)) * 4

    # Display result
    print(volume)

if __name__ == "__main__":
    main()
